You don't see this kind of service anymore, I was very impressed by his kindness.

title: Perfect family retreat
review: Rose We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us and we want to thank you for your comments. Our primary focus is our guests and we are working daily to ensure we provide exceptional customer service all the time every time.  Kind Regards, Management

title: Great holidays!
review: Great resort, but DO NOT use the hot tubs. I just stayed there with my family and my husband and I both developed a MRSA skin abscess within a day of using the hot tub. Thankfully, my husband is a physician and was able to call in a script for antibiotics. I attempted to contact management and have not gotten a return call.

title: First timers to this facility
review: Yes this is a new facility and there is construction going on. My wife and I had a three bedroom condo and our son, his wife, and four children stayed in another unit close to us. All of us enjoyed our units with one having a hot tub. There is also a beautiful pool and we were told a soon to open restaurant on the resort grounds. The staff were wonderful and very helpful. We would highly recommend this resort to any family. One last thing. An uber car to the Disney park is around $7 and he drops you off in front of the park.

title: Complete Scam
review: Dear First Timers. We are extremely happy that you and your family enjoyed your vacation with us!  Our number one priority is customer service, and we continually work hard to ensure we deliver the best we have to offer.  We hope as we continue to improve and complete our Resort, you will return to experience the Magic!,  Thank you, Management

title: Brand new complex was good for our needs
review: Booked this hotel on short notice after another plan fell through. On another website Magic Village Resort has a 5 star review and based on the pictures it looked like a great place to take a family for a Disney vacation.   Once we got into the area the taxi driver used the GPS to locate the entrance. The entrance is gated and we were not given a code. There is a telecom system, but when we pressed the connect to the front desk no one answered. We had to drive around the back side only to see that the resort is under major construction.   This place isn't even close to being completed. The hotel listings are completely inaccurate.   Most of the listed features are not completed. No restaurant, no fitness center, or no bar. Those are just the things we found out once we got there…

title: Perfect location and accomodation
review: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to place such a detail review of your recent experience at our Resort.  The resort is presently being built on phases and phase 1, which is the phase were all the amenities, Club House and services to our visitors are provided is complete at 100%.  Phase 2 is almost complete and most of the buildings will be delivered this month.  Our fitness center, kids club, concierge, pool, hot tub as well as our free internet service and cable system are fully functional and operational.   Our restaurant is on schedule to open this upcoming week and we will offer a variety of fine dishes and drinks to satisfy the most demanding pallet.  We would’ve love to have had the opportunity to host you and your family and to provide you with our distinctive customer service and superb accommodations; we are certain you wouldn’t be disappointed.  We hope you can give us an opportunity in the future so you can experience the best that Central Florida have to offer.  Have a great Holiday Season and thank you for your visit.

title: Under construction don't book
review: We were a group of 3 adults & 3 kids who booked and then got worried about lack of reviews on TripAdvisor. but things turned out fine, so long as you are prepared that the site is under construction but your unit itself will be fine. Right now only a small fraction of the units are ready which was fine by us as we had the pool to ourselves. I wonder once it gets busier how the amenities will manage.    The common kids room was barely finished, small gym was open and restaurant not yet open. Outside bbq not yet hooked up to gas. Business centre is really 2 computers in the lobby with a printer. Because the complex is under construction, there will be workmen passing by all the time. Of the 5 units in our building, I'm guessing 2 were occupied.   Things to know - extra charge for…

title: "Not open but booking rooms"
review: Booked vacation for July 13th to July 19th . Called today  5/11/2015 to pay trip off. They tell me the resort want be open to august ,when are you going to call me and let me know. I cancel a great reservation at Marriott Grande Vista to try this resort big mistake. It's hard this late in the game to find accommodation up to the standards I'm used too. Don't book until you know it's open. Quit taking people's money if you are not open!

title: Dumped by Property
review: I made this reservation back on January 4th 2015. Since this was a new property, I check often to see if there are any reviews on the property as of yet. On April 10th after still not finding any reviews. I decided to contact the property directly to find out why. This property is currently under construction. Also it will NOT be ready for guests until JULY 2015. I asked the gentleman on the phone, "When did you or did you even plan on contacting people who have reservations for May & June". He told me "Oh yes we were going to start calling on Monday April 13th, we are prepared to offer travelers to stay at another one of our properties"  Well if you plan trips months out like I do, because we travel in a large group.  You will know that it is hard to find nice accommodations…
